key.name: allowed-extensions
key.description: Files with these extensions will be parsed.

key.name: skipped-dirs
key.description: Directories ignored by parser when looking for files.

key.name: show-empty-marks
key.description: If true, empty marks will appear on screen with 0 entries, but just on marks title menu.

key.name: require-colon
key.description: Enable or disable matching just marks with colon at the end. When enabled, just marks like "TODO:", "FIXME:", etc. will match properly, and marks like "IMPROVE" will not.

key.name: known-marks
key.description: Known marks that the parser will look for in files.

key.name: mark-colors
key.description: Define the color for each known mark.
